pages.text: Glowstone (Block) and Redstone Torches can also be inserted into the pedestal. $(br)$(li)Glowstone will add some glowing bands to the pedestal that emit light. $(br)$(li)Inserting redstone torches toggles its redstone control, but doesnt display on the pedestal in any way.

pages.title: Misc (Inserting)
pages.text: When inserting, it can be done with the item in the Offhand, then Right Click the pedestal, this will remove one item from your hand, placing it in the pedestal.

pages.title: Misc (Extracting)
pages.text: When extracting, put the item corresponding to the one your removing in the Offhand, then Left Click. This will remove the currently inserted item from the pedestal.
